title: Interesting idea but too poorly explained
review:
The idea seems rather interesting and the experimental results encouraging (although -- small point-- I found your plotted curves for BatchNorm on Cifar-100 rather suspicious, there was no discontinuity at the 2nd learning rate reduction).

Unfortunately I don't think I can recommend to accept this paper as it was too un-clearly explained.  I think the authors should try to get the involvement of someone with more machine learning experience who might be able to solidify their ideas.
confidence: 4: The reviewer is confident but not absolutely certain that the evaluation is correct
